script.line: Okay, this is gonna be fine. We're at the best possible place to figure this out.
The library? Minty can't even read! Or... I don't think she can read.
Minty doesn't need to read. It's everybody else. Sheesh, Prota. You never lost a dog before?
All we gotta do is put up signs and someone will return Minty to you!
So then... why are we at the library?
Because we need to make a hundred copies of our lost dog posters and this is the best place to do it!
Couldn't we just go to Paperclips? They're the biggest office supply in town.
You know I can't go back to Paperclips.
Right... But I can't remember why.
They remember why. That's all that matters.
Haha oh right! You wiped out in the laptop aisle in front of all the new trainees!
And you had-- was it a milkshake in your hand?
...We can't do this right now.
Fine, right, okay. So what should we do?
YOU should get some paper, pick a great picture of Minty, and decide what to write on it.
And I'll stand over here eating this bag of Drifties.
You're not gonna help me?
I'll supervise. You know Minty better than me anyway.
And let's be honest... you've got the superior people skills.
I guess I am widely loved...
Okay! Let's do this. I guess I'll have to pick the paper?
(*munch munch munch*)
Sorry, yes. Paper first!
